Showcasing a wide collection of perfect coffee makers, dinner sets, tea sets, kitchen accessories, stainless steel utensils, bar accessories, bed covers, cushions, rugs, bath mats, carpets, place mats, etc....

An Introduction

Here, at Home Ideal, a vast collection of kitchen accessories, bar accessories, home furnishing items, etc. are manufactured using latest manufacturing techniques. Quality maintenance is another positive aspect of this organization.

Today this firm has been adjudged as the champion manufacturer, exporter and importer of coffee makers, dinner sets, tea sets, kitchen accessories, stainless steel utensils, bar accessories, bed covers, cushions, rugs, bath mats, carpets, place mats, etc. We cover the entire continent of Europe, America & South America under our export market whereas a part of Europe, China & South East Asian nations, falls under the canopy of our import market.

We process high grade steel for manufacturing variety of utensils in different shapes and volumes. Other products such as home furnishing items are made out of good quality fabrics. Bed sheets, cushions, curtains, etc. are available in attractive designs and exquisite embroideries.

Our expertize enables us to develop products as per the specifications given by the clients. We work with a customer centric approach therefore quote price for products which is nominal and competitive. Further we are proud to announce that our product delivery mechanism is prompt and punctual. One can count on us for all types of high quality kitchenware and home furnishing items.

Product Range

Home Ideal is a well recognized firm in the international markets because its products are used by the clients from all over the world. The company has an edge in this regard over its competitors. Every product manufactured by this organization is an icon of quality, long shelf life and advanced features. Our product range includes:

Coffee makers Dinner sets Tea sets Kitchen accessories Stainless steel utensils Bar accessories Imported glassware Tumblers Vacuum flasks Home furnishing items: Bed covers, cushions, rugs, bath mats, carpets, place mats, etc.

Assured Quality

Our quality management system is such that even a minute flaw in a product is quickly detected and the corrective measures are immediately initiated. In this regard, the role played by our quality staff is appreciable and praise worthy.

Quality has been the first and foremost concern of our organization since our company's inception. We ensure supply of premium quality kitchen accessories, bar accessories and home furnishing items on the base of excellent quality control system.

The Inside Story

Our manufacturing unit is segregated into three segments. One segment is meant for manufacturing high quality kitchen utensils and allied accessories. At the second segment, bar accessories are developed. The third segment is fully dedicated to manufacture all types of stylish and trendy home furnishing items.

We have installed latest machines and equipment to each segment for effective and flawless production of our products. Daksh Exim Solutions Pvt. Ltd. is well supported by its manpower. Some prominent personnel are engineers, designers, quality analysts, research staff, amongst others. With wide marketing network across the globe, we ensure timely delivery under any circumstances.
